text: Ipatinga is a Brazilian city in the Vale do Aço metropolitan area, state of Minas Gerais. Its population in 2009 was 244.508 inhabitants. Its area is . The city was founded in April 29, 1964. It's limited with Caratinga, Coronel Fabriciano, Mesquita, Santana do Paraíso and Timóteo. == Images == Vista dos bairros Ideal e Esperança a partir do Ideal, Ipatinga MG.JPG Vista parcial do Parque Ipanema, Ipatinga MG2.JPG Vista parcial do Shopping Vale do Aço, Ipatinga MG2.JPG Fachada do Teatro Zélia Olguin, Ipatinga MG2.jpg Fachada da Igreja Nossa Senhora da Esperança do B.
